Howard Stern to David Letterman : sorry about your sex scandal( video) Instead of deflecting Howard Stern 's apology, David Letterman responded with candor and a bit of reciprocal praise. `` You have been very, very nice to me on the radio and viciously ugly to me on the radio and I except both with equanimity because I know a little bit about how you operate and I'm still fond of your talent and your ability and what you've represented to the United States of America-and of course, the world. . Steve Ballmer formally introduced Windows 7 last month at an industry event in New York City. Steve Ballmer said Windows 7 is simple to use, responsive, and unobtrusively secure-all things Vista was not. The OS makes everyday use of a PC better, said Steve Ballmer . Asked whether he planned to stay another four years at Google to collect stock awards worth$ 100 million, Eric Schmidt said: Yes, that is my plan. This is something worth singing about: The winner of Fox's upcoming singing competition series will receive a hefty$ 5 million grand prize- the largest in television history- the network announced Monday. We are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million recording contract, executive producer Simon Cowell said in a statement.`` I'm doing this show in America because I genuinely believe we can find a superstar.''
